pages.text: It is said that Drinkro™ was invented by an enterprise located in the Silicon Valley. Its main functionality is $(em)to move liquid around$(). $(br)Drinkro™ can make $(em)regular drink$(), $(em)smoothie$(), $(em)gelo$() and $(em)soda$().$(br2)Unfortunately, that enterprise $(em)went bankrupt$() after incurring substantial amount of criticism. Putting history aside - we still managed to get its original blueprints!

Drinkro™ is a multiblock structure consisted with two blocks stacked vertically. The upper half is where $(em)fluid ingredients$() and $(em)additional items$() go into the Drinkro™, and it can hold one bucket of fluid and 4 additional items at maximum. Additional items may

be regular seasonings or $(em)"special item"$() which decides the type of drink; for each drink, there must be $(em)at most one$() such "speical item". The lower half is where the drinks are produced, and you should put a container there to receive your drinks.$(br2)There are four different type of drinks; each type has different "primary" effects on players. Different juices can also affect "primary" effects. Without any special item, the produced drink is the regular

drink. Drinks may be used to alleviate $(l:misc/effect_resistance)Effect Resistance$(). $(br2)If there is a special item, the container must also match that special item. After matched, give the Drinkro™ $(em)redstone pulse$() will make it start to work.$(br2)Detailed informations about types of drink may be found in following pages.

drink. Drinks may be used to alleviate $(l:misc/effect_resistance)Effect Resistance$(). $(br2)If there is a special item, the container must also match that special item. After matched, give the Drinkro™ enough $(em)energy$() will make it start to work.$(br2)Detailed informations about types of drink may be found in following pages.
